article: There was a big sea bird that was very beautiful. One day, the sea bird  _  to a country and stayed outside of a palace. The Emperor asked his men to bring it to the palace. Then he said , "As a welcome for the sea bird, we'll  set up  the band and get the best food and wine ready for  _  . So they played the best music for the sea bird, but it  _  bored. The Emperor introduced the most delicious food and best wine and asked the bird to have them. But the sea bird  _  . After three days  _  eating or drinking, the sea bird died. The Emperor said  _  , "Why didn't you eat? I have you all of the best!" The  _  tells us that what some people believe to be the best music and the best food aren't so for  _  . Feed a bird according to a bird's wants, not a  _  . The saying "Do to others as you would have others do to you." Is never really suitable or right.
